Posts.Content: i am 31 and i found a lump on monday went for a mammogram on thursday and surgery to remove said lump on friday discovered next week it was malignant.....it works really fast. good luck
Posts.Title: lump against my chest wall

Posts.Content: Hi i am a 31 year old female scheduled for a lumpectomy and radiation for a 22mm size tumor.....any experiences would be appreciated as to what to expect...
Posts.Title: lumpectomy with radiation

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by Kalie Most lumpectomies don't require a drain. Drains are reserved for more radical surgeries like mastectomies in which the body has lots of fluid that needs to drain over day/wks. hi...well i have a drain...yuck!! i have had to carry around this tube and bottle for a week now. It comes out next wednesday
Posts.Title: lumpectomy with radiation

Posts.Content: Did you have a drain in place?
